text: "If I Ever Lose My Faith in You" is a 1993 song by Sting. It is the leading single from his fourth studio album Ten Summoner's Tales. It went to number 1 in Canada, number 2 in Italy and Portugal, number 17 in the United States, number 14 in the United Kingdom, number 9 in Iceland, number 30 in the Netherlands, number 41 in Australia, number 31 in Germany, number 36 in New Zealand, number 39 in France, number 9 in Spain and number 7 in Norway.
